name: Order Confirmation
subject: Your Starlink Order Confirmation
html_content:
Thank You for Your Order!

Dear {{customer_name}},

Your Starlink pre-booking has been confirmed. Here are your order details:

Order ID: {{order_id}}

Service Type: {{service_type}}

Plan: {{plan_name}}

Device Cost: ₹{{device_cost}}

Monthly Cost: ₹{{plan_cost}}/month

Total Amount: ₹{{total_amount}}

Shipping: Starts January 2026

What happens next:

  1. You will receive installation instructions via email
  2. Our team will contact you for installation scheduling
  3. Device ships within estimated timeframe
  4. Professional installation will be arranged
Track Your Order

If you have any questions, please contact our support team.

Best regards,
Starlink India Team
